1.title: Odd Coupling
1.plot: Wade creates a "meet-cute" situation in the laundry room to try and break the ice with his neighbor Cassandra, but his attempts to woo her are interrupted when his best friend Chuck arrives, having been dumped and needing a place to stay.

2.title: Roundersing
2.plot: Wade hosts a poker game, with his nerdy co-workers, as an excuse to invite Cassandra to his apartment. Chuck may be in over his head when he joins the game to take on the nerds.

3.title: Fatal Attractioning
3.plot: Chuck's jilted wife Rebecca drops by the apartment, unannounced, with dubious intentions, creating friction between the guys.

locations: Metuchen, New Jersey, USA::(Chuck and Wade's Man Cave)
imdb.plot outline: Wade, a socially awkward nerd with a gambling problem, and Chuck, a narcissistic sociopath and self-diagnosed sex addict, are lifelong best friends, each in the midst of a midlife crisis. Their friendship is put to the test when Chuck gets dumped and invites himself to move into Wade's one bedroom apartment on the same night that Wade finally attempts to break the ice with his attractive, but emotionally unavailable neighbor, Cassandra.
imdb.title: The Midlifers
plot: Addictive personalities clash as two best friends, in the midst of their own midlife crises, try to share a one bedroom apartment.::Brian K. Millard

Wade, a socially awkward nerd with a gambling problem, and Chuck, a narcissistic sociopath and self-diagnosed sex addict, are lifelong best friends, each in the midst of a midlife crisis. Their friendship is put to the test when Chuck gets dumped and invites himself to move into Wade's one bedroom apartment on the same night that Wade finally attempts to break the ice with his attractive, but emotionally unavailable neighbor, Cassandra.::Brian K. Millard
